title: Power cut schedule announced for Monday and Tuesday
body_lines: The power cut schedule for tomorrow (25) and Tuesday (26) for three  hour and twenty minutes was announced today, the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said.
They said approval for tomorrow's power shedding was granted following a request from the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB).

Accordingly, power shedding will be imposed in the A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W for two hour from 9.30am to 5.30pm and one hour and twenty minutes from 5.30pm to 9.30pm.
Area CC will be subjected to a three-hour power cut from 6am to 9pm
The PUCSL regrets the inconvenience caused to electricity consumers due to prevailing power cuts. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
